review.title: RWA Outlook in Asia (2026-2029)
review.notes:
Draft 1: 2026 is the pivot year. Not minted — mobile. The whole industry shifts from creating tokens to sustaining trading volume. Thats the move. (138 chars)

Draft 2: HK. Singapore. Dubai. Three jurisdictions racing to be Asias RWA hub. Hong Kong has the funds. Singapore has Project Guardian. VARA in Dubai built the worlds first end-to-end framework. Place your bets. (224 chars)

Draft 3: Money market funds are the breakout asset class. Yield-bearing + 24/7 liquidity + fractional access. Franklin Templeton, China Asset Management already in. The institutional wave is here. (209 chars)

---Research Summary---
Key findings:
- 2026 = pivot year (minted to mobile)
- HK/Singapore/Dubai racing for RWA hub status
- Money market funds = breakout asset class
- Global RWA market: $19-36B now → $100B+ by 2027
- Key players: Franklin Templeton, HashKey, ChainUp
- Major regulations: SFC (HK), MAS (SG), VARA (UAE), FSA (Japan)
